backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that includes blob storage mixin and provides contact form submission functionality with methods to store, retrieve all, and filter submissions by project type or email.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three portfolio gallery image rendering features related to fixing image paths, verifying filenames, and rendering all 120 generated images with proper titles and descriptions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, UI elements, and configuration files for the Casa Di Vida interior design website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes, including warm earth tones and design tokens for the luxury interior design aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and module script loading for Casa Di Vida Interior Decoration and Designs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that orchestrates the entire single-page application layout with Navigation, Hero, Services, Portfolio, About, Contact sections, Footer, and Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying Casa Di Vida's design philosophy, company values (Passion, Excellence, Client-Centered, Timeless Beauty) with icons, and a featured quote about their approach.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: React Hook Form-based contact form with validation for name, email, phone, project type, and message fields, integrated with backend submission via useContactSubmission hook and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section wrapper displaying ContactForm alongside business information including email, phone, location, and office hours with icon-decorated contact methods.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Casa Di Vida branding, quick navigation links with smooth scrolling, contact information, and copyright notice with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component with full-screen background image, Casa Di Vida branding, call-to-action buttons for contact and portfolio, and an animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with smooth scrolling to sections, active section highlighting, responsive mobile menu using Sheet component, and transparent-to-solid background transition on scroll.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioGallery: Portfolio gallery component with tabbed categories (home, office, commercial, outdoor) displaying project images in a grid with modal dialog for viewing full details and descriptions.
Services section displaying four interior design services (Space Planning, Color Consultation, Furniture Selection, Full Room Design) in card format with icons, images, and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating and refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
React Query mutation hook for submitting contact form data to the backend actor, with automatic query invalidation on successful submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and context provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind configuration defining a luxury interior design color scheme using warm earth tones, creams, and gold accents in both light and dark modes, plus custom typography with Playfair Display and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wrapping the App component with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors (oklch-based luxury palette with gold accents), typography, animations, and plugins for a sophisticated interior design aesthetic.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining Casa Di Vida as a luxury interior design showcase website requiring a portfolio with 120 images across 4 categories (Home, Commercial, Office, Hotels) and contact form backend storage.
